result.eng: It will be cold tomorrow morning.
result.ga: Beidh sé fuar maidin amárach
result.orig: Beidh sé fuar maidin amárach
result.html: Beidh sé fuar maidin amárachIt will be cold tomorrow morning.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé fuar maidin amáraċIt will be cold tomorrow morning.

result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ga: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.orig: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom

result.ponchtml: Ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna

result.eng: I listen to the radio in the morning.
result.ga: Bím ag éisteacht leis an raidió ar maidin
result.orig: Bím ag éisteacht leis an raidió ar maidin
result.html: Bím ag éisteacht leis an raidió ar maidinI listen to the radio in the morning.

result.eng: She runs in the park every morning.

result.orig: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidin
result.html: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidinShe runs in the park every morning.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sí ag riṫ sa ṗáirc gaċ maidinShe runs in the park every morning.

result.eng: He buys a newspaper every morning.

result.orig: Ceannaíonn sé nuachtán gach maidin
result.html: Ceannaíonn sé nuachtán gach maidinHe buys a newspaper every morning.

result.eng: I got up at eight in the morning.

result.ponchtml: Dá ḃfanfainn go maidinIf I waited till morning...

result.eng: I said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.

result.eng: Early in the morning.

result.eng: I woke up early in the morning.

result.eng: It was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.

result.orig: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna

result.eng: The post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ga: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin

result.eng: Seán goes cycling each morning.
result.ga: Téann Seán ag rothaíocht gach maidin

result.html: Téann Seán ag rothaíocht gach maidinSeán goes cycling each morning.
result.ponchtml: Téann Seán ag roṫaíoċt gaċ maidinSeán goes cycling each morning.

result.eng: Do you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?

result.orig: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidin

result.eng: I love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.
result.ga: Is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidin

result.eng: What do you want to eat this morning?

result.eng: The course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ga: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn

result.eng: I have to get up early in the morning.

result.eng: I'm in work every morning around nine.
result.ga: Bím san obair gach maidin timpeall a naoi

result.html: Bím san obair gach maidin timpeall a naoiI'm in work every morning around nine.
result.ponchtml: Bím san obair gaċ maidin timpeall a naoiI'm in work every morning around nine.

result.eng: She starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine
result.orig: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine

result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críoċnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíċe seaċt lá in aġaiḋ na seaċtaineShe starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.

result.eng: I remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.

result.eng: They decided to stay on dry land till morning.

result.eng: Where will I rest my head tonight?

result.eng: He would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
